summary: A documentary presenting mankind's most ambitious effort at perfecting the means to its own annihilation. Featuring newly unclassified atomic test footage.
cast: William Shatner|Edward Teller|W.H.P. Blandy|Frank H. Shelton|Dwight D. Eisenhower|Adlai Stevenson|Randall William Cook|Nikolai Bulganin|Winston Churchill|Everett Dirksen|Albert Einstein|Enrico Fermi|Reed Hadley|Averell Harriman|Adolf Hitler|Hubert H. Humphrey|John F. Kennedy|Nikita Khrushchev|Zedong Mao|Anastas Mikoyan|Marilyn Monroe|J. Robert Oppenheimer|Franklin D. Roosevelt|Dean Rusk|Woodrow P. Swancutt|Leó Szilárd|Mark Tapscott|Paul Tibbets|Wernher von Braun|John von Neumann|Roy Neal
keywords: archive footage|nuclear weapons|atomic bomb|nuclear test|pacific ocean
title: Trinity and Beyond: The Atomic Bomb Movie
